Jx.Plugin.Grid.Resize

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Grid plugin to enable dynamic resizing of column width and row height

License

Copyright © 2009, DM Solutions Group.

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Plugin.Grid.ResizeExtends: Jx.Plugin
Options
columnset to true to make column widths resizeable
rowset to true to make row heights resizeable
tooltipthe tooltip to display for the draggable portion of the cell header, localized with MooTools.lang.get(‘Jx’,’plugin.resize’).tooltip for default
Functions
attachSets up the plugin and connects it to the grid
detach
activate
deactivate

Options

column

set to true to make column widths resizeable

row

set to true to make row heights resizeable

tooltip

the tooltip to display for the draggable portion of the cell header, localized with MooTools.lang.get(‘Jx’,’plugin.resize’).tooltip for default

Functions

attach

attach: function (grid)

Sets up the plugin and connects it to the grid

detach

detach: function()

activate

activate: function(option)

deactivate

deactivate: function(option)
